user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic getaway to Napa Valley. Can you suggest some wineries and vineyards for wine tasting? Also, find us a cozy bed and breakfast in the area for our stay.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of wineries and vineyards in Napa Valley that offer wine tasting experiences.
Search for cozy bed and breakfast accommodations in Napa Valley for the stay.
Present the compiled list of wineries and vineyards along with the bed and breakfast options to the user.
